home.pitch:
I am a passionate and versatile Full Stack Developer with over three years of experience, specializing in both front-end and back-end technologies.

I have solid expertise in the Vue.js and JavaScript ecosystems, honed over two years of front-end development.

During my recent experience, I expanded my skill set by contributing to key projects at Symbol-It, particularly with Adeo Leroy Merlin, where I played a pivotal role in optimizing transaction tunnels and enhancing supplier performance systems.

My curiosity and dedication drive me to continually grow, and I thrive in collaborative environments where I can contribute innovative solutions. Fluent in English, Italian, and French, I am eager to bring my diverse skill set to a forward-thinking development team.

checkout-store.description: As a full-stack developer at Leroy Merlin, I worked within the ELO team on the order funnel project, a multichannel solution aimed at transforming the in-store customer experience. I also contributed to several other projects in the same environment, including the development of front-end libraries, back-end architecture, and Back for Front (BFF).

tasks.title: Task Design and Requirements Gathering
tasks.description: Collaborated with product managers, developers, and testers to understand project needs, define tasks, and assess technical feasibility.

tasks.title: Front-End Development
tasks.description: Created responsive and accessible user interfaces with Vue.js, ensuring compliance with accessibility standards.

tasks.title: Back-End Development and Back for Front (BFF)
tasks.description: Worked with Java in a back-end and Back for Front architecture, integrating multiple back-end systems to retrieve, aggregate, and map necessary data for the front-end.

tasks.title: Cross-Team Collaboration
tasks.description: Collaborated closely with design, QA, and development teams to ensure consistency throughout the development cycle, from design to deployment.

tasks.title: Task Management and Product Monitoring
tasks.description: Monitored the functionality of applications, assessed performance, and resolved issues to ensure system stability post-deployment.

tasks.title: Performance Optimization
tasks.description: Optimized application performance by identifying bottlenecks and implementing solutions to enhance user experience.

tasks.title: Testing
tasks.description: Conducted unit and integration tests to ensure the quality and reliability of the application.

tasks.title: CI/CD Process
tasks.description: Implemented new features to the existing CI/CD process, such as SONARQUBE analysis to guarantee code quality.

tasks.title: Tracking
tasks.description: Implemented tracking solutions to monitor user behavior and gather insights for future improvements.

tasks.title: Critical User Journeys and Terraform Integration
tasks.description: Developed critical user journeys and integrated Terraform to manage infrastructure as code.

tasks.title: Product Analysis Abroad
tasks.description: Participated in international business trips to analyze products on-site, gather stakeholder feedback, and refine solutions based on real use cases.

stocky.description: Stocky is a web application designed to simplify equipment fleet management. The application provides access to the fleet, its management, usage statistics, and billing.

tasks.title: Team Collaboration
tasks.description: Collaborated within a team comprising a PO, a back-end tech lead, three full-stack developers, and a QA specialist.

tasks.title: Conception
tasks.description: Designed the front-end and back-end architecture, ensuring seamless integration.

tasks.title: CI/CD Process
tasks.description: Implemented Docker images to streamline deployment and environment management.

tasks.title: Deployment
tasks.description: Deployed the application efficiently using Fly.io, ensuring optimal availability.

tasks.title: Database Management
tasks.description: Built a robust PostgreSQL database using CockroachDB for enhanced data reliability.

tasks.description: Developed the front-end, prioritizing user experience and ease of use.

tasks.title: Back-End Development
tasks.description: Developed the back-end, ensuring robust functionality and performance.

tasks.title: Testing

scpt-360.description: As a front-end developer at Adeo Leroy Merlin, I collaborated with a multidisciplinary team on a global application for monitoring supplier performance. This application provides tailored user experiences based on roles, focusing on key performance indicators.

tasks.title: Collaborative Team Environment
tasks.description: Worked alongside a team comprising a back-end developer, a tech lead, a designer, a quality tester, a data scientist, and a digital product leader.

tasks.title: Integration with Java SpringBoot
tasks.description: Gained front-end development experience while integrating with a back-end environment built using Java SpringBoot.

tasks.title: Development of Charts
tasks.description: Created dynamic charts using vue-chart.js and chart.js technologies to visualize data effectively.

tasks.title: Design System Contribution
tasks.description: Contributed to the development and enhancement of ADEO's internal design system for consistency and scalability.

tasks.title: Internationalization
tasks.description: Handled application internationalization using i18n for multilingual support.

tasks.title: Quality Assurance Testing
tasks.description: Conducted rigorous testing prior to deployment to uphold high application quality standards.

tasks.title: Deployment
tasks.description: Deployed the application within ADEO's micro-frontend framework, Kobi, ensuring seamless integration and functionality.

tasks.title: Collaboration and Meetings
tasks.description: Collaborated with designers and QA testers during multiple meetings to refine and validate designs and functionalities.

tasks.title: Agile Scrum Methodology
tasks.description: Adhered to Agile Scrum practices, participating in regular meetings to discuss user stories and ensure consistent progress.

symbol-it.description: I worked on internal projects at Symbol-IT, including the RUN and BUILD phases of various JS projects.
